GSD.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
coresight: cpu-debug: Replace mutex with mutex_trylock on panic notifier

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit c0a39ce74080b4cfc276c22b03626fb4df398e37, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 2227b7c7463402ce92706a6f35c82cad6e8ee19a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: coresight: cpu-debug: Replace mutex with mutex_trylock on panic notifier
